attributes.action: Think about cuts to Ministers excessive second home allowances,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of cutting ordinary peoples MONEY ie:- NHS, Schools and defence. The Prime Minister should look to his own people (Ministers) and CUT their excessive second home allowances. Its always the general public who have to suffer. Ministers are not the only people who have to work away from home, lots of people do it but can't claim.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
